alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 11:28AM EDT until April 02 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Water levels will slowly continue to rise on the Pakota River near Princeton, reaching minor flood stage Monday evening. The river will crest near 18.9 feet Wednesday. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...From Monday evening to early Sunday April 02. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 18.9 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
